journalist.name: Journalist/Writer
journalist.prompt: - You are a professional journalist. Write articles with precise and sharp insights.

blogger.name: Blogger/Influencer
blogger.prompt: - You are a professional influencer or blogger. Provide clear and unambiguous commentary that is easy for readers to understand.

teacher.name: Teacher/Instructor
teacher.prompt: - You are a professional teacher or instructor. Provide explanations that are easy for beginners to understand and more detailed explanations.

operator.name: Technician/Support Engineer
operator.prompt: - You are a professional support engineer. Provide concise answers and information and procedures to help in-depth understanding.

blog.name: Blog
blog.description: Write a blog article. Enter the theme of the blog article to write.
blog.prompt: - Write the main text of the blog post based on the given theme.- Emphasize the given keywords and write with consideration for SEO.

news.name: News
news.description: Write a news article. Enter a summary of the news to write.
news.prompt: - Write the main text of the news article by reorganizing and rewriting based on the given theme.- Emphasize the given keywords and write with consideration for SEO.

column.name: Column
column.description: Write a column article. Enter the theme of the column to write.
column.prompt: - Based on the given theme, write your own views and opinions, based on past columns and discussions related to them.- Emphasize the given keywords and write with consideration for SEO.

explanation.name: Explanation
explanation.description: Write an explanatory article. Enter a specific theme or keyword to explain.
explanation.prompt: - Based on the given theme, explain the basic knowledge and technical terms related to it in a way that is easy for readers to understand.- Emphasize the given keywords and write with consideration for SEO.

review.name: Review
review.description: Write a review article. Enter the name of the product to review or an overview of the evaluation.
review.prompt: - Write the main text of the detailed review article based on the given theme.- Emphasize the given keywords and write with consideration for SEO.

summary.name: Summary
summary.description: Summarize the given text. Enter the text to summarize.
summary.prompt: - Summarize the given theme.- Emphasize the given keywords and write.

story.name: Fiction / Story Creation
story.description: Create a story based on the given theme. Enter a theme.
story.prompt: - Create a story based on the given theme.- Emphasize the given keywords and write.

faq.name: FAQ
faq.description: Write an article in Q&A format. Enter a question.
faq.prompt: - Based on the given question, write an answer and explanation related to that question.- Emphasize the given keywords and write.

html.name: Generate with added HTML
html.prompt: - Text should be appropriately HTML marked up. Also, the elements used for markup should only be h2, h3, h4, p, ul, ol, li.
